title: A Thriving Community, Beautiful People,  With Relaxing Features
posting_body: Westhaven Apartments offers newly renovated apartment homes featuring new black appliances, vinyl wood floors, cozy wood-burning fireplaces, and full-size washers and dryers.
Surrounded by seven acres of manicured lawns, Westhaven offers the convenience of a city location with the serene feel of the country.
Westhaven is located close to South Seattle Community College, downtown Seattle, shopping, schools, and freeways.
So whether you are a student at the nearby college, or commute to work in downtown Seattle, Westhaven is an ideal place for you to call home.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
Our homes accommodate up to 2 pets per home, with no weight limit (breed restrictions apply).
Pet deposit of $300 and monthly pet rent of $50 each pet.
Your pets will love it here!
Income Requirements are 3x the amount of rent Gross Income.
Take WA-599 N. Then Hwy 99 N to Highland Park Way SW in Seattle.
Continue straight onto Highland Park Way SW.
Turn right onto SW Holden St. Turn right onto 20th Ave SW.
Ave SW turns left and becomes 21st
Turn Left onto Delridge Way SW.
Turn right onto SW Holden St. Turn left onto 24th
Turn right at SW Chicago Ct/SW Portland Ct and Destination will be on the left.
Heading South Bound: I-5 S. Follow I-5 S to Corson Ave S. Take exit 2162 from I-5 S. Get on Hwy 99S/WA-509S/WA-99S. Continue on Hwy 99S/WA-509 to WA-99/2nd
Take the WA-99 S exit from Hwy 99 S/WA-509 S/WA-99S. Take W Marginal Way SW, Highland Park SW, and SW Holden St to your destination.
